Gateway API Tutorial¶

class isensit_gw.ISensitGW[source]¶

Handle gateway configuration.

get_aws_credentials()[source]¶

Return SECRET KEY and ACCESS KEY for AWS :rtype: object

get_gateway_id()[source]¶

Return the gateway id :return: gateway id :rtype: int

get_gateway_name()[source]¶

Return the current gateway name. :return: gateway id :rtype: string

get_get_url()[source]¶

Return the GET url of AWS. :return: aws url :rtype: str

get_mysql_credentials()[source]¶

Return MySQL credentials, host, username and password :return: Host, Username, Password :rtype: object

get_mysql_sleeptime()[source]¶

Return Sleeptime for BLE reading :return: sleeptime :rtype: int

get_post_url()[source]¶

Return the AWS POST URL. :return: POST url :rtype: string

get_software_version()[source]¶

Retrun the Software Version :return: software version :rtype: string

init_json_config_data()[source]¶

Initialise class via the json config file. :return: True if config file was found, Flase if not found. :rtype: Boolean

set_software_version(version)[source]¶

Set Gateway Software Version :param version: new version to set :type version: string

static update_config_file(item, value)[source]¶

Update Config File :param item: Key for the config file :type item: String :param value: Value for the Key :type value: String :return: success status :rtype: string
